kubejs.ponder.altar.text_1: After the altar is built, it slowly absorbs the surrounding Aura and deposits it into the Natural Altar
kubejs.ponder.altar.text_2: Place the items that need to be poured into the Natural Altar, and if there is enough Aura in the Natural Altar, the items in it will be Aura infused
kubejs.ponder.altar.text_3: The Catalystcan be placed in these four locations
kubejs.ponder.altar.text_4: After the catalyst is placed, the natural altar will have more Recipe
kubejs.ponder.nether_altar.text_1: Placing the natural altar on the Nether will turn it into the Crimson Altar
kubejs.ponder.nether_altar.text_2: The use of the Crimson Altar is not much different from the Natural Altar, the Crimson Altar can collect the Aura of the Nether and pour it into the item
kubejs.ponder.nether_altar.text_3: The Crimson Altars can also use catalysts, and Catalyst placed on the Nether will change its texture
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_1: Firstly, place the items needed for the ritual on the Wooden Stand.The order of placement is arbitrary
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_2: Place the Golden Powder like this
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_3: You can place blocks to mark the position
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_4: Then place lthe sapling specified in the ritual recipe
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_5: Wait for the sapling to grow or force it to grow
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_6: If the placed items are correct, the ritual will begin and consume the Golden Powder, Tree, and Items on the Wooden Stand
kubejs.ponder.tree_ritual.text_7: After the ritual is complete, the product will appear
